Component.explanatoryText: Which hepatic lobe does the lesion mainly occupy?
Component.label: Lobar Location

AllowedTerm.codeMeaning: anterior segment of right lobe of liver
posterior segment of right lobe of liver
lateral segment of left lobe of liver
medial segment of left lobe of liver

Component.explanatoryText: Which hepatic segments does the annotated lesion mainly occupy?  Up to 2 choices for bridging lesions.
Component.label: Segmental Location

Component.explanatoryText: Mass, normal, or geographic alteration? Almost all annotations will be for a mass.
Component.label: Lesion Type

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: What is the etiology of the lesion or its presumed etiology?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Diagnosis

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: What is the phase of intravenous contrast enhancement, or is it a noncontrast scan?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Imaging Phase

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: How many lesions with a given diagnosis? Are there also more complex distribution patterns?  Up to 2 responses.
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Focality of Lesion

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: What is the overall shape or shapes associated with the lesion?  Up to 3 responses.
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Shape Descriptors

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: How smooth or irregular is the outer lesion contour or boundary?  Do not confuse with border *defnition*.  Quantify from smooth (1) to irregular (100)
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Margin Contours: Smooth to Irregular

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Estimate the overall lesion density given all internal components.  For the current imaging phase only.
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Average Lesion Density: Hypo to Hyperdense

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Is the lesion uniform (homogeneous) or nonuniform (heterogeneous) internally?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Density - Homogeneous or Heterogeneous

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Does the lesion enhance with intravenous contrast?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Enhancement

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Only if enhancing, is the enhancement homogeneous or heterogeneous?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Enhancement Uniformity

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: If enhancing, what pattern(s) are observed? Choose up to 3 features.
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Specific Enhancement Pattern(s)

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: On multiphasic imaging, what happens to enhancement over time?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Temporal Enhancement (if known)

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: If septations are present, how thick are they?  Note "septated" may be included as a Shape Descriptor above.
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Septation Thickness

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Is the perilesional tissue normal, or is there a THAD or similar effect?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Perilesional Tissue

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Is there calcification, necrosis, central scar or other special feature(s)?  Up to 3 responses.
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Special Features

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: Choose up to 3 additional features about how the lesion affects the liver.
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Lesion Effects on Liver

ImagingObservationCharacteristic.explanatoryText: For lesions that are metastases, what is the primary?
ImagingObservationCharacteristic.label: Primary Malignancy if Metastatic Disease
